GET /api/word/daily.description: Returns a 5 letter word, which will be randomised each day

POST /api/word/daily.describe: Takes a 5 letter word and responds with an array of each letter and if it is a valid letter and/or if it is in the correct position when compared to the daily word of that day

GET /api/word/ids.description: Returns an array of random wordIds, and can take a quantity (q) query to determine the number of wordIds to be given, up to a maximum of 10

POST /api/word/:wordId.describe: Takes a 5 letter word and responds with an array of each letter and if it is a valid letter and/or if it is in the correct position when compared to a word from the given wordId
